author: Francisco Martin
comment: Initially gave it a 1 star rating as the app was crashing. The support team guided me how to fix the issue and it is working once again. You need to clear your cache, make sure you turn off your automatic backup and restore on the app and then un install and re-install again. That took care of my issue.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Savage_ Vlogs
comment: I hated it. It frustrates me very much. It is telling me I have a line2 account but I know I very much don't. I hate this app with a passion gave it 1 star. Hated it bye might come back if y'all can fix my account

author: Lisa Melby
comment: Love, love my line 2. Have had it for years! Beat deal out there! Try their fax service, beat ever. You can have any phone u have accept line 2 calls. With one phone u have an additional phone line  with line 2.  Line 2 had its own messaging. I have a personal line and a business line on one phone! Great, responsive costumer service!

author: A Google User
comment: I've written a review back in 2015 and I'll update it now. This app (and the desktops) are worlds behind any other platform. Messages disappear, app freezes, just a clusterfuck all around. Voice quality on WiFi is good, bad on 3g.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Hi Google User. Thanks for the UX feedback. With regard to crashes, that's not our experience. If you create a ticket at support.line2.com we'll help you figure out what's causing it. Most simply, an uninstall/reinstall should fix it, but we're glad to look at your application logs to try and diagnose as needed. Hope we can assist!

author: Don H
comment: Could not open the app since a update Tried everything - restart, clear memory, reinstall, etc. Spent a lot of time & finally back to normal. Need more testing before updates.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Francis Herasme
comment: It's OK but it doesn't record calls like the windows app and some of the stuff have to be done thru the computer in order to work in the app. Will continue to test app and update later.
Service does not work. No one can here your calls you make, I always have to dial from another number.

author: Khuzema Ghafoor
comment: It was crashing . They fixed it..and good job with replying to their customers and their feedback. Thumbs up

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

comment: No picture messages for Canadians. Wish I knew sooner. I'm canceling asap

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: We are sorry to hear about the issue you experienced but would like to try and help with this. Please contact our support team by launching the Line2 app, selecting "more" (three vertical dots) - Help - Email Our Support Team.

author: Robert Hopkins
comment: Been a good app for our business. We use the number for texting and keeps seperate from real cell number.

author: Peter Giesbrecht
comment: All issues resolved, once again a great service! Thank you

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Arnold Saguran
comment: This App is perfect. Not hassle at all.

author: Dipankar Saini
comment: Great experience. Thanks.

author: StudySmiths Videos
comment: Love using this app

author: David Alan Owains
comment: It's cool

author: Kyle hassett
comment: Cool

author: Trevor Sharpe
comment: App is good. Though every time there is an update installed it hangs the app and it won't open. I have to uninstall then install again. This is on a Samsung Note 4. Still... way better than getting an actual phone plan since I only pay for a 3GB tablet data plan.

author: shawn z
comment: after updating the app won't be able to open, keeps freezing my galaxy note 8

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Mehar Kumar
comment: Latest update does not work and I cannot even open app.Try to fix it.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Niosha S. Tobon
comment: App isn't even opening since last update. FIX THIS APP. ITS NOT WORKING

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: gannamani srikanth
comment: Worst app I ever used..

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: Jon Case
comment: Perfect and very good for US users.

author: Britney Cervantes
comment: Wants money!

author: Gavin Grant
comment: The app no longer works.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Please upgrade to the latest version of the app.  If you are still experiencing issues, please reach out to our support team at support@line2.com.

author: K. S. Arvin
comment: Great UI and customer service. Only problem is that I can't seem to get the calls that come in from Line2 to ring with the different ringtone I selected. In other words, all the calls "sound like" they are calling my main cell number, not the Line2 number. I don't like that at all.

author: Edgar Gonzalez
comment: Don't waste your time, I tried it for about 6 months. You have to constantly uninstall it since it glitches a lot, customer service is rude.

author: tonya wright
comment: I would like refund. Purchased thru app instead of Google play store option.  Was unaware that this app requires previous data/wifi connection.  My Email is different than Google play store addy.  Already contacted your support team, awaiting response. However I didn't get a chance to use app but for one call so I am unable to rate its features.

author: Antonio Castillo
comment: As of 16 hours ago, Line2 has been down due to a DDoS attack. Not acceptable, nothing in place to protect from this type of thing. Feeling very disappointed right now. This could go on for days, maybe longer. On the edge of transferring my number. Other than that, was liking the app.  Update...Since the latest update, my Line2 app does not receive incoming messages or calls when away from my wifi network. Arghh! I have to place an outgoing call to receive my incoming messages. Arghhh! FIX THIS PLEASE!

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: We apologize for the inconvenience. We had a persistent DDoS attack on the day you were having trouble. It's resolved and the service is available now. Please visit support.line2.com to contact our Support Team if you are experiencing any further issues.

author: Vi Flaten
comment: I don't get calls.  The calls I place have very poor reception and a large delay.  I plan on trying something else soon.

author: Anton Vetrov
comment: The app became more uncomfortable: 1. Cannot select my own rington anymore - only phone preset ones :( 2.when selecting tone-key options, the screen supports a screen width only, and if you have to enter more selections: you don't see anymore what you're typing. 3. When you are on tone-key pad- you cannot amore terminate the call easy: have to go back to the main screen first.

author: Abigail Plumley
comment: Do not advise using this if you need reliability and connectivity - customer service is poor, slow to respond (if at all) - used for quite some time attempting to make it work, but in the end went to a standard wireless plan.  It might work better in an office setting, but very poor over cellular phone (especially when not connected to wifi).  They would not prorate any refund at the end either.  Overall, poor experience.

author: Qwin Humphries
comment: Been using for my business for years. Great incoming calls, text, and voicemail. Slight delay in outbound calls though.

author: Michael McClure
comment: Needs to have a feature to delete multiple messages instead of having to waste my time and delete each conversation individually.

reply.author: Line2 Inc.
reply.content: Michael, thank you for your feedback.  The Line2 app has the ability to delete an entire message thread by going into that message thread, selecting the "more" (3 vertical dots) and then selecting "Delete conversation".  I hope this helps!

comment: Have used as a business line for over a year. Good call quality, texts & VM messages work. Economical choice for my needs.

author: Diane Houlton
comment: Constantly dropping calls and calls are overridden by any call on the main cell phone line.  It's embarrassing.

author: Victoria Ford
comment: Does what it says. Had a few problems initially but customer service was fast to respond.
Why would I want a second number to call someone using a second number? If this is intended for business this makes no sense.

author: Pro Nation
comment: Do not download. You can only call people who have this same app as you. You have to invite them to line2 and you will be able to phone them ⚠Only people who have this app can phone each other.

author: Mez X
comment: So far so good,  call quality is working for me but waiting on getting my number ported and will the update my review!
Since installation app is only crashing
